alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 1:49PM AKST until January 02 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Plan on areas of significantly reduced visibilities to one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause areas of significant blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Parks Highway south of the Denali Park Entrance. * WHEN...3 AM Saturday to 3 PM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slick roadways to create difficult travel conditions at times. Cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
